title: It Goes to Eleventy
speaker: Mike Aparicio
summary: Eleventy (11ty.dev) is a static site generator based on Node, and is used to create the Fizz website. Mike will do a live demo of Eleventy, building a site for The Sauce in real-time from scratch.

title: RSpec & Testing
speaker: Tye Shavik
summary: Tye will be teaching us the intricacies of rspec and testing.
